Class PlayerExt

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.PlayerExt
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observable<Message>
public class PlayerExt
extends Player
implements Observable<Message>
Player ext class. Extends Player and implements Observable interface. Manage all the player's attribute.

    • isActivable

      public boolean isActivable()
      Returns:
      True if the player own enough resources to active the power production chosen. False if the player hasn't any power production or hasn't enough resources.
